biscotti 07 b **hook** crochet hook 4 mm / us g/6 **yarn quality** bella coco merino hobbii 100 % wool 50 g 1 75 oz = 165 m 180 yds **gauge** 12 5 sts x 14 row = 5 cm x 5 cm / 2 x 2 measured over cuff ribbing **pattern information** these beautifully textured wrist warmers are crocheted using bella coco merino to provide warmth and functionality crocheted from the bottom up in one piece the pattern will require you to work in row and rounds patten uses single_crochet and treble_crochet to create texture and is suitable for advanced beginners and beyond photo credit nicola white photography
